attributes.additional_details:
When will you address the issue of Aspergic pupil? This
condition is multiplying through genetic inheritance with
many parents be-ing unaware of cause of the indifferent behaviour.Specialised teachers should be appointed to
Schools  to gather these children together in a class where they can identify with others having the condition.
These kids are highly gifted and intelligent but are unable to socially interact. Help them to understand themselves and how to fit into Society.

rejection.details: Please use a more specific title in order for your petition to be easily identified
